ALX_Atlas_Arteria_2024.notes: Scope 2 uses market-based methodology [1]. Scope 3 represents customer emissions only [1].

APX_Appen_2023.notes: Scope 1 (Natural gas) [2, 3]. Scope 2 uses Market-Based methodology [2, 3].

ARF_Arena_REIT_FY2024.notes: Organizational inventory. Scope 1 and 2 are zero due to purchasing GreenPower [4, 5]. Scope 3 reflects organizational scope 3 emissions (excluding Downstream Leased Assets) [5].

AZJ_Aurizon_FY2023.notes: Scope 1 emissions reported in FY2023 [6]. Scope 2 uses Market-based methodology [7]. Scope 3 emissions reported in FY2023 [7].

DXS_Dexus_FY2025.notes: Group managed portfolio, based on independently assured data for FY25 [8]. Scope 2 (market-based) is 0 [9, 10]. Scope 3 uses market-based methodology [11].

IVE_Group_2022.notes: Emissions data for the 2022 calendar year [12].

MY_MyState_FY2023.notes: Operational emissions for FY23. Scope 3 excludes financed emissions [13, 14].

OFX_Group_2025.notes: Scope 1 emissions are zero [15]. Scope 2 uses market-based methodology where available [15, 16]. Scope 3 emissions reported for 2025 [15].

PNI_Pinnacle_FY2024.notes: Scope 1 is 0 [17]. Scope 2 (market-based) is 0 due to LGC purchases [17, 18]. Scope 3 uses market-based methodology [17].

REA_Group_FY2025.notes: Scope 2 uses market-based methodology [19]. Total Scope 3 emissions for FY25 [20].

SDR_SiteMinder_CY2023.notes: Scope 1 emissions are zero [21, 22]. Scope 2 reflects reduction due to transition to 100% GreenPower in Sydney office [21, 23]. Scope 3 emissions for CY23 [21].

SLC_Superloop_FY2025.notes: FY25 GHG emissions based on baseline assessment [24-26].

TPW_Temple_Webster_FY2025.notes: FY25 gross emissions figures [27]. Scope 3 excludes product manufacturing, use of sold products, end-of-life treatment of sold products, and investments due to limitations [27].

TYR_Tyro_FY2023.notes: Emissions for FY23 [28]. Scope 1 is zero [28].

WPR_Waypoint_REIT_FY2023.notes: FY23 Measured Emissions. Scope 1 is zero [29, 30]. Scope 2 emissions are market-based [31]. Scope 3 total includes only selected direct Scope 3 categories (3, 5, 6, 7, 8) [29, 30, 32].

ZIP_Zip_Water_Group_2024.notes: Emissions data for the 2024 calendar year [33, 34].
